name: Bravo Sniper Strike Assassin Commando -Trigger Shot to Kill Real Rivals Adventure
name_original: Bravo Sniper Strike Assassin Commando -Trigger Shot to Kill Real Rivals Adventure
description:
Are you ready to eliminate terrorist getting in the way of world peace. Play as the best sniper shooter in the most dynamic assassin shooting game. Do you have the fastest trigger fist to complete these dangerous assault missions?
Be focused and show that you are the best bravo sniper strike commando for these assault missions. You can shoot these terrorist in a mob or in a single high-profile target. Get the highest score by targeting one kill in one shot. Zoom in and out for clear vision. Find the best sniper headshot and vantage points to make all the necessary kill shot. Ready for the challenge?
